name: Strife (itch)
description:
You have no idea where you are, who you are, and what your purpose is. All you know is that you want to escape. Uncover the mysteries and discover the truth.

Made during a Game Jam - Theme: Reflection

I hope you enjoy!

CREDITS

Music

  • Apocryphos, Kammarheit, Atrium Carceri - A Lonely Strain
  • Atrium Carceri - Worship
